[COMMANDS]
_excel exceladdin.txt | c:$/patching\test.bat $S $R$/$1
_word wordaddin.txt | c:$/patching\test.bat $S $R$/$1
_nodelocal nodelocal.js | c:$/patching$/nodelocal.bat $1 $R
[FILES]
extra node_modules/neu.*
ignore **/*.(c|cpp|h|sh|asm|md|coffee|afm|as|cc|tbl|msg|db)
# the following line can be removed when the corresponding contracts are removed from nodeconfig.js
copy node_modules/(sprint1|zz)/**/*
copy node_modules/syracuse-ui/lib/**/tests/*.(_js|js)
ignore node_modules/**/(test|tests|examples|bin)/**/*
ignore **/.*
ignore (.git|try-git|tools|deps|import|stubs|x3index)/**/*
copy **/*.(png|bmp|html|css|ico)
copy **/*.json
# encrypt node_modules/**/*.(_js|js)
copy node_modules/**/*.(_js|js)
copy index.js
_nodelocal nodelocal*.js
copy node_modules/**/*.xml
_excel dotnet/ExcelAddIn/**/*
_word dotnet/WordAddIn/**/*
ignore dotnet/**/*
ignore config.txt
